verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> which came to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> concerning the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>

Of <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%> concerning the <S%H2428>army<s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6549>Necoh<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> which was by the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H6578>Euphrates<s%> in <S%H3751>Carchemish,<s%> which <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> <S%H5221>struck<s%> in the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>
<S%H6186>Prepare<s%> the <S%H4043>buckler<s%> and <S%H6793>shield,<s%> and draw <S%H5066>near<s%> to <S%H4421>battle!<s%>

<S%H631>Harness<s%> the <S%H5483>horses,<s%> and get <S%H5927>up,<s%> you <S%H6571>horsemen,<s%> and stand <S%H3320>forth<s%> with your <S%H3553>helmets;<s%> <S%H4838>furbish<s%> the <S%H7420>spears,<s%> put <S%H3847>on<s%> the coats of <S%H5630>mail.<s%>

Why have I <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H2844>it?<s%> they are dismayed and are <S%H5472>turned<s%> <S%H268>backward;<s%> and their mighty <S%H1368>ones<s%> are beaten <S%H3807>down,<s%> and have <S%H5127>fled<s%> <S%H4498>apace,<s%> and <S%H6437>don't<s%> look back: <S%H4032>terror<s%> is on every <S%H5439>side,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H7031>Don't<s%> let the swift flee <S%H5127>away,<s%> nor the mighty <S%H1368>man<s%> <S%H4422>escape;<s%> in the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H6578>Euphrates<s%> have they <S%H3782>stumbled<s%> and <S%H5307>fallen.<s%>
Who is this who rises <S%H5927>up<s%> like the <S%H2975>Nile,<s%> whose <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H1607>toss<s%> themselves like the <S%H5104>rivers?<s%>

<S%H4714>Egypt<s%> rises <S%H5927>up<s%> like the <S%H2975>Nile,<s%> and his <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H1607>toss<s%> themselves like the <S%H5104>rivers:<s%> and he <S%H559>says,<s%> I will rise <S%H5927>up,<s%> I will <S%H3680>cover<s%> the <S%H776>earth;<s%> I will <S%H6>destroy<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> and its <S%H3427>inhabitants.<s%>

Go <S%H5927>up,<s%> you <S%H5483>horses;<s%> and <S%H1984>rage,<s%> you <S%H7393>chariots;<s%> and let the mighty <S%H1368>men<s%> go <S%H3318>forth:<s%> <S%H3568>Cush<s%> and <S%H6316>Put,<s%> who <S%H8610>handle<s%> the <S%H4043>shield;<s%> and the <S%H3866>Ludim,<s%> who <S%H8610>handle<s%> and <S%H1869>bend<s%> the <S%H7198>bow.<s%>

For that <S%H3117>day<s%> is of the <S%H136>Lord,<s%> <S%H136>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> a <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H5360>vengeance,<s%> that he may <S%H5358>avenge<s%> him of his <S%H6862>adversaries:<s%> and the <S%H2719>sword<s%> shall <S%H398>devour<s%> and be <S%H7646>satiate,<s%> and shall <S%H7301>drink<s%> its fill of their <S%H1818>blood;<s%> for the <S%H136>Lord,<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> has a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> in the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H776>country<s%> by the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H6578>Euphrates.<s%>

Go <S%H5927>up<s%> into <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H6875>balm,<s%> <S%H1330>virgin<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%> in <S%H7723>vain<s%> do you use <S%H7235>many<s%> <S%H7499>medicines;<s%> there is no healing for <S%H8585>you.<s%>

The <S%H1471>nations<s%> have <S%H8085>heard<s%> of your <S%H7036>shame,<s%> and the <S%H776>earth<s%> is full of your <S%H6682>cry;<s%> for the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H1368>man<s%> has <S%H3782>stumbled<s%> against the <S%H1368>mighty,<s%> they are <S%H5307>fallen<s%> <S%H8147>both<s%> of them <S%H3162>together.<s%>

The <S%H1697>word<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> how that <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> should <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H5221>strike<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

<S%H5046>Declare<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H8085>publish<s%> in <S%H4024>Migdol,<s%> and <S%H8085>publish<s%> in <S%H5297>Memphis<s%> and in <S%H8471>Tahpanhes:<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> Stand <S%H3320>forth,<s%> and <S%H3559>prepare;<s%> for the <S%H2719>sword<s%> has <S%H398>devoured<s%> around <S%H5439>you.<s%>
Why are your <S%H47>strong<s%> ones swept <S%H5502>away?<s%> they <S%H5975>didn't<s%> stand, because <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> pushed <S%H1920>them.<s%>

He made <S%H7235>many<s%> to <S%H3782>stumble,<s%> <S%H5307>yes,<s%> they fell <S%H376>one<s%> on <S%H7453>another:<s%> and they <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6965>Arise,<s%> and let us go <S%H7725>again<s%> to our own <S%H5971>people,<s%> and to the <S%H776>land<s%> of our <S%H4138>birth,<s%> <S%H6440>from<s%> the <S%H3238>oppressing<s%> <S%H2719>sword.<s%>
They <S%H7121>cried<s%> <S%H6547>there,<s%> Pharaoh <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> is but a <S%H7588>noise;<s%> he has let the <S%H4150>appointed<s%> time pass <S%H5674>by.<s%>

As I <S%H2416>live,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H4428>King,<s%> whose <S%H8034>name<s%> is <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> surely like <S%H8396>Tabor<s%> among the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> and like <S%H3760>Carmel<s%> by the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> so shall he <S%H935>come.<s%>

You <S%H1323>daughter<s%> who <S%H3427>dwells<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H6213>furnish<s%> yourself to go into <S%H3627>captivity;<s%> for <S%H5297>Memphis<s%> shall become a <S%H8047>desolation,<s%> and shall be <S%H3341>burnt<s%> <S%H3427>up,<s%> without inhabitant.
<S%H4714>Egypt<s%> is a very <S%H3304>beautiful<s%> <S%H5697>heifer;<s%> but <S%H7171>destruction<s%> <S%H935>out<s%> of the <S%H6828>north<s%> has <S%H935>come,<s%> it has come.

Also her hired <S%H7916>men<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of her are like <S%H5695>calves<s%> of the <S%H4770>stall;<s%> for they also are turned <S%H6437>back,<s%> they are fled <S%H5127>away<s%> <S%H3162>together,<s%> they <S%H5975>didn't<s%> stand: for the <S%H3117>day<s%> of their <S%H343>calamity<s%> has <S%H935>come<s%> on <S%H6256>them,<s%> the time of their <S%H6486>visitation.<s%>

The <S%H6963>sound<s%> of it shall <S%H3212>go<s%> like the <S%H5175>serpent;<s%> for they shall <S%H3212>march<s%> with an <S%H2428>army,<s%> and <S%H935>come<s%> against her with <S%H7134>axes,<s%> as <S%H6086>wood<s%> <S%H2404>cutters.<s%>

They shall cut <S%H3772>down<s%> her <S%H3293>forest,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> though it <S%H2713>can't<s%> be searched; because they are <S%H7231>more<s%> than the <S%H697>locusts,<s%> and are <S%H369>innumerable.<s%>

The <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> shall be <S%H3001>disappointed;<s%> she shall be <S%H5414>delivered<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H6828>north.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>says:<s%> <S%H6485>Behold,<s%> I will punish <S%H527>Amon<s%> of <S%H4996>No,<s%> and <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> with her <S%H430>gods,<s%> and her <S%H4428>kings;<s%> even <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and those who trust in <S%H982>him:<s%>

and I will <S%H5414>deliver<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of those who <S%H1245>seek<s%> their <S%H5315>lives,<s%> and into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of his <S%H5650>servants;<s%> and <S%H310>afterwards<s%> it shall be <S%H7931>inhabited,<s%> as in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H6924>old,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

But <S%H3372>don't<s%> you be afraid, <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> my <S%H5650>servant,<s%> neither be <S%H2865>dismayed,<s%> <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H3467>for,<s%> behold, I will save you from <S%H7350>afar,<s%> and your <S%H2233>seed<s%> from the <S%H776>land<s%> of their <S%H7628>captivity;<s%> and <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> shall <S%H7725>return,<s%> and shall be <S%H8252>quiet<s%> and at <S%H7599>ease,<s%> and none shall make him <S%H2729>afraid.<s%>

<S%H3372>Don't<s%> you be afraid, O <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> my <S%H5650>servant,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> for I am with <S%H6213>you:<s%> for I will make a full <S%H3617>end<s%> of all the <S%H1471>nations<s%> where I have <S%H5080>driven<s%> <S%H6213>you;<s%> but I will not make a full <S%H3617>end<s%> of <S%H3256>you,<s%> but I will correct you in <S%H4941>measure,<s%> and will in no <S%H5352>way<s%> leave you <S%H5352>unpunished.<s%>
